name: The Witcher: Of Flesh and Flame Part 3
summary: Another mysterious incident looms heavy over Ofier, threatening the king. To help combat it, Geralt works side by side with Radeyah to pro- cure[sic] and construct weapons strong enough to defeat the dark force. However, there are more nemeses than Geralt quite realizes, and a confrontation in which he believes himself to be helping only leads to more trouble for the witcher.
info:
• 话数: 1
  • 作者: CD Projekt RED、Aleksandra Motyka
  • 出版社: Dark Horse Comics
  • 作画: Marianna Strychowska
  • 发售日: February 20, 2019
